358.title: Arjun
358.description: Meet Arjun, a rebel-cop and the lead of the Emergency Task Force who doesn't mind going the extra mile to ensure justice, even if it takes breaking rules.

363.title: Savdhaan India
363.description: From a dangerous murder plot to a thoroughly planned robbery, unmask the gory face of terror through a dramatised version of the crimes happening around you!

1654.title: SuperCops
1654.description: ACP Diler and his team of supercops fight deadly villains, mutants and monsters for the safety of the common man.

15034.title: Savdhaan India - F.I.R.
15034.description: Honest and brave police officers are out to investigate tough cases and nab twisted criminals across the nation. Zurm ka bura time shuru!

1000207868.title: Indrajit
1000207868.description: During a rape case investigation, an honest police officer learns about the criminal background of the MLA who recommended him for his job. Will he expose him?

1000212789.title: Raid
1000212789.description: Fearless income tax officer Amay Patnaik carries out a risky raid at the mansion of the most powerful man in Lucknow. Inspired by real-life events.

1260008666.title: Savdhaan India - Special Crime Series
1260008666.description: As crimes get bigger, and criminals turn sinister, here's a series of spine-chilling stories packed with nail-biting suspense and thrill.

1260049386.title: Criminal Justice: Behind Closed Doors
1260049386.description: Anuradha Chandra stabs her perfect lawyer husband one fateful night and confesses to her crime. However, it is anything but an open-and-shut case.

1260054967.title: The Tattoo Murders
1260054967.description: Police officer Aditi must catch a serial killer with just one clue, a scorpion tattoo on the victims. To stop the menace, she must dig into her own past.

1260055764.title: Nave Lakshya
1260055764.description: Mumbai Police can find a needle in a haystack, and Unit 9, their elite force, pursues justice and shields the common man from criminals with a humane touch.

1260062944.title: Crime Next Door
1260062944.description: Inspector Shekhawat investigates some of the most heinous and toughest murder cases of his entire career. Tough to crack, the truth is not always what it seems.

1260081024.title: Rudra: The Edge of Darkness
1260081024.description: In the crime-ridden streets of Mumbai, journeying through the maze of psychopathic minds is brilliant supercop Rudraveer Singh, guarding against their darkness.

1260083987.title: Once Upon A Time in Mumbaai
1260083987.description: Sultan rules the hearts but tops the wanted list. However, his reign in Mumbai is threatened when his protégé turns overambitious and a bloodbath ensues.

1260099968.title: Civil Servant
1260099968.description: A young and ambitious secret service agent learns the rules of the international spy game but will have to overcome authority when his country is under attack.

1260103179.title: 9 Hours
1260103179.description: Three prisoners, three teams, three banks and nine hours to pull off three impossible heists and return to jail. Can they do it?

1260108807.title: Sisterhood
1260108807.description: Days before her wedding, Ipek learns the shocking truth that she has two sisters. However, soon after meeting, the sisters find themselves in an unexpected situation.

1260108952.title: Criminal Justice: Adhura Sach
1260108952.description: When a teenage star's brother becomes the prime suspect in her murder, Madhav Mishra takes the case, only to realise he has to first tackle his client's lies.

1260109485.title: Cadaver
1260109485.description: A high-profile murder baffles the cops when a prison inmate claims responsibility and promises more deaths. Will police surgeon Bhadra crack this mystery?
1260109485.crisp: Mature Theme, Gore, Some Disturbing Scenes

1260113215.title: Aar Ya Paar
1260113215.description: When the modern world's greed destroys his idyllic tribal existence, a valiant archer becomes a deadly assassin to get even.
